/usr/bin/g++  -g   CMakeFiles/oop4new.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/oop4new.dir/FullRestorePoint.cpp.o CMakeFiles/oop4new.dir/DeltaRestorePoint.cpp.o CMakeFiles/oop4new.dir/IRestorePoint.cpp.o CMakeFiles/oop4new.dir/Storage.cpp.o CMakeFiles/oop4new.dir/BackUp.cpp.o CMakeFiles/oop4new.dir/RP_Creator.cpp.o CMakeFiles/oop4new.dir/Delta_RP_Creator.cpp.o CMakeFiles/oop4new.dir/Full_RP_Creator.cpp.o  -o oop4new  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libboost_filesystem.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_system.so
